title: My mother is the most beautiful woman in the world
creator_credit: Chris Jenkyms, Stephen Bosustow, Film Associates and Stephen Bosustow Productions
brief_description: Animated Ukrainian folk tale with the moral that we love people for what they are not for how they look. Suitable for lower and middle primary levels.
